column4: the Sihanouk International Airport Police Force in cooperation with the police headquarters deported two foreigners on charges of ‘suspicion of planning a crime’ (*not sure
column5: but at least 2 websites and a ministry post say the same thing. Possibly some sort of conspiracy charge).------The two foreigners were:------1 / LIU MIN male
column8: 20 years old Chinese national.------Both were expelled from Cambodia on Flight QD728 (KOS-CHN) and banned from returning for three years.
